snippet: he game between the San Antonio Spurs and the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday night in Mexico City was postponed because of smoke inside the arena.
abstract: Game between the San Antonio Spurs and the Minnesota Timberwolves in Mexico City is postponed due to smoke inside the arena; rescheduled game will be played in Minneapolis; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: he game between the San Antonio Spurs and the Minnesota Timberwolves on Wednesday night in Mexico City was postponed because of smoke inside the arena.

headline.main: N.B.A. Game Postponed in Mexico Because of Smoke in Arena
headline.print_headline: Game Postponed in Mexico Because of Smoke in Arena
